scripts.start: npm run clean:build && npm run dev
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development BUILD_ENV=dev PORTAL_NAME=dashboard APP_PORT=3000 next dev -p 3000
scripts.start:dev: NODE_ENV=production BUILD_ENV=dev PORTAL_NAME=dashboard APP_PORT=7000 node_modules/next/dist/bin/next start -p 7000
scripts.start:qa: NODE_ENV=production BUILD_ENV=qa PORTAL_NAME=dashboard APP_PORT=7000 node_modules/next/dist/bin/next start -p 7000
scripts.start:prod: NODE_ENV=production BUILD_ENV=prod PORTAL_NAME=dashboard APP_PORT=7000 node_modules/next/dist/bin/next start -p 7000
scripts.test-build:dev: npm run clean:build && npm run build:dev && npm run start:dev
scripts.test-build:qa: npm run clean:build && npm run build:qa && npm run start:qa
scripts.test-build:prod: npm run clean:build && npm run build:prod && npm run start:prod
